overview: Edwin Durell the man who created the wildly popular Every Woman Has a Fantasy and 1001 Erotic Nights series now brings you his most impressive feature ever...Masque. When six longtime friends indulge their fantasies of having sex with each other, the reality exceeds their wildest dreams. By weaving together a series of riveting interviews with choreographed kinky scenarios, Durell creates a montage of unrequited lust that becomes desire fulfilled.
title: Masque
